title: Which Way Switch
description: Wouldn’t it be great to get what you want at the flick of a switch? Just think what you could get….or get rid of.Twelve-year-old Lucas thinks life would be miles better if he could just sort out a few issues. For one thing he’s lost all hope of credibility at school following his embarrassing first team debut. For another the girl he secretly fancies constantly teases him. And then there’s his irritating sister. That’s when discovering an old light switch with magical powers comes in handy. With the switch at his fingertips, it seems Lucas will have the world at his feet.Or so he thinks.The light switch has a dark side too. That’s why it’s the Which Way Switch…
author: T.J. Rogers
